recipe.title: Coconut Mango Freezer-Prep Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Add the kale, banana, mango, kiwi, coconut oil, cinnamon, and turmeric to a resealable container. Cover and store in the freezer for up to 3 months.
When ready to prepare, add the contents from the container and the almond milk to a blender and blend until smooth.
